titleStmt.title: The louers guift, or a Fairing for maides being a dialogue betweene Edmund and Prisilly. To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by E. Allde] for Iohn Trundle, and are to be solde at his shop in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and date of publication from STC.
In two parts, printed side by side; the second part has title: [The s]econd part of the louers gift, to the same tnne [sic].
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
